column17:
Tommy Bahama Very Cool Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2736

Tropical islands with their bright colors cool sands and abundant beaches provide inspiration for this soothing fragrance from Seattle fashion house Tommy Bahama. The luxury fragrance transcends boundaries and transports you right to the edge of the beach; you can almost feel the gentle waves lapping at your feet as you sip your cocktail enwrapped in the essence of Tommy Bahama Very Cool. The luxury fragrance is reminiscent of the cool depths of the ocean titillating and rejuvenating. Splash on the Eau de Parfum and be off on the journey of a lifetime.

Created by Jean-Claude Delville in 2006 Very Cool is a aura that moulds itself to your curves and keeps you floating on a cloud of desire and delight. Cheery opening notes with accords of clementine pomegranate and tangerine start off the day on a bright sparkling note as they fade into a floral heart of hibiscus cassia and cactus flower. As the dance of the white flower fades out the sweet succulence of nectarine and musk hold hands in the base note leaving you cool calm and collected. Contained in a decanter that reflects the cool blue of the ocean Tommy Bahama Very Cool is the epitome of crisp succulence. Kick back relax and let the fragrance sweep you away with out of this world olfactory revelations.
